#summary Template to reload settings when then are changed, by an external agent.

= Introduction =

This plugin determines the location of your settings and then watches them using a FileSystemWatcher. If they should be changedby some external force, they will be reloaded.

=== Details === 

Thi plugin enables 2 specific scenarios:
 * CodeRush option changes in one instance of visual studio to be immediately reflected in another.
 * CodeRush option changes sync'd to one machine from nother via service like Live Mesh will be immediately loaded into any running copies of Studio on the destination machine.

= Installation =

Installation instructions can be found on the InstallInstructions page.

= Usage =

This plugin is entirely ambient and requires no interaction.
